blogPost.title: Joan Didion, the literary journalist and novelist whose writings included chronicles of life in Los Angeles and "The Year of Magical Thinking," has died at 87 https://t.co/nmZdnT7fu2

localize.full_text: ロサンゼルスでの生活記録や「魔法にかけられた年」などの著作で知られる文芸ジャーナリスト・小説家のジョーン・ディディオンが87歳で死去 https://t.co/nmZdnT7fu2
